name: Hop Hop Miner
description:
Hop Hop Miner is an action-procedural game where you need to collect as many golden gem as possible. All the caves are made procedurally so they are different every time (so if you loose, try again!). You start only with 3 lives and there is a permadeath, so choose wisely upgrades from the shop!

How many golden gems can you collect? Post the screenshot down below! :)

This games was made in 7 days for the VimJam with jam focus on "collectables" and a theme "there and back".
For collectables I decided to go for the gems that are crucial in this game since you need them in order to buy upgrades and proceed.
For the theme "there and back"  the player need to collect the golden gem and carry it back. 

This is my first time with procedural generation, so be understanding! XD
Follow me on twitter if you like my game @hav24  

Controls:   
- Arrow keys or WASD to move (you can move only left and right).
- Mouse click to buy upgrades from the shop.
